description:
Quizmine and RealSimpleEDU.com brings you "on-the-go" learning and reference for English Grammar.


  App offers 20 interactive tutorials and 13 quizzes with search features.


  Includes following tutorials:

  
  Introduction,

  Noun,

  Pronoun,

  Adjective,

  Prepositions And Conjunctions,

  Common Errors,

  Punctuation,

  Verbs And Adverbs,

  Words To Remember,

  Tenses,

  Active And Passive Voice,

  Modals,

  Idioms,

  Phrases 1,

  Phrases 2,

  Grammar And Writing,

  Focus On Commas,

  Adjective And Adverbs,

  Articles,

  Commonly Confused Words.

 
  Our Vision: Provide on-the-go references that enable our customers to refer, learn and remember; easy to learn, more engaging and most complete.

  Our Mission: A RealSimpleEDU app in every pocket.


  Please write to us. We would love to improve this app.
versionNote:
Updated tutorials and quizzes based on Customer feedback.

Please write to us. We would love to improve this app.
